text: Nimen zai zhanchang shang yu dao bu xindao zhe de shihou, yingdang zhansha tamen, nimen ji zhansheng tamen, jiu yingdang fulu tamen; yihou huo shifang tamen, huo zhunxu tamen shushen, zhidao zhanzheng fangxia ta de zhongdan. Shiqing jiushi zheyang de, jiaruo zhenzhu yiyu, ta bi chengzhi tamen; dan ta ming nimen kangzhan, yibian ta yi nimen huxiang kaoyan. Wei zhu dao er zhenwang zhe, zhenzhu jue bu wangfei tamen de shangong,
